text: Carlo Nordio (born 6 February 1947) is an Italian former magistrate and prosecutor who has been the Minister of Justice since 2022. In the 2022 presidential election, he was the candidate of Brothers of Italy for President of Italy.Chi Ã¨ Carlo Nordio, il candidato presidente della Repubblica del centrodestra, Fanpage In 2022 he was elected to the Chamber of Deputies. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Veneto Category:People from Treviso Category:Italian judges Category:Italian lawyers
